title: Mrs. Skagg's Husbands and Other Stories
creator: Bret Harte
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
description: LibriVox recording of Mrs. Skagg's Husbands and Other Stories, by Bret Harte. [if appropriate: Read by Nick Bulka. A collection of short stories set in the American West (California) mining communities in the mid-19th century. (Summary by Nick Bulka) For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: LibriVox; audiobooks; adventure; fiction; short-stories; westerns; western; california; cowboy; santa claus
